body: The work continues to build the new center of Children's Hope. 'The building is still far to be done, but we think it will be finished to the end of the year' says the chief of the project
Opening of the new cafe in Naples for children of all ages.

tittle: New playrooms in Rome and Bologna
body: From next week, children will be able to enjoy our new playrooms in Rome and Bologna free of charge.
After a year today, the new opening of the renovated car park is made in our center in Naples so that parents have easier access to our facilities.

The next month a trip to Venice is made from all our centers, the inscriptions have already been opened.
Last month's trip to Parma was a success, more excursions are expected in the future.
Two new menus are already available at our centers in Milan and Naples
From the next week we will have three new professionals in our rehabilitation centers to offer a better service.
Now we have in our study centers new scholarships so that children can continue studying.
